name: bdpayx
description: BDT to INR Currency Exchange Platform

scripts.backend:build: cd backend-go && go build -o bdpayx-backend main.go
scripts.frontend:build: cd flutter_app && flutter build web --release --web-renderer canvaskit
scripts.dev: echo 'Start: npm run backend:dev (terminal 1) && npm run frontend:dev (terminal 2) && npm run admin:serve (terminal 3)'
scripts.build: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build
scripts.clean: cd flutter_app && flutter clean && flutter pub get && cd ../backend-go && go clean && go mod tidy
scripts.optimize: npm run clean && npm run build

author: BDPayX Team
